PISCES TODAY. What to do���what not to do���should you���shouldn't you���such words and questions might be arising in your mind as you feel increasingly unsure about which step to take in some way that is in your best interests to take. A clash could exist between what's familiar and comfortable and what's beckoning you to venture into unknown territory. Your heart might well be sending a clear message as to why staying put is the best option. That should make it easier to follow from there.
